column1: '''Paul Brooke''' is an English radio and television actor. His credits include the ''Dr. Who'' radio series and ''Bridget Jones' Diary''
column2: but his most iconic role is that of the weeping
column3: fat-bellied [http://starwars.wikia.com/wiki/Malakili Rancor guard] in the third ''Star Wars'' movie
column4: ''The Return of the Jedi''. He voiced the part of [[Gríma|Gríma Wormtongue]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|The Lord of the Rings 1981 radio series]] broadcasted on the BBC 4.
